price: 56.Diggah tama munaafiqhiin nanu sin innaah moominiin kinnino axcuk Yallal xiibitta, usun sin innah moominiinih yan maray yeemene hinnon, kinnih immay usun siinik meesitaah meesih xiibita mara kinnon.
arabic: وَيَحۡلِفُونَ بِٱللَّهِ إِنَّهُمۡ لَمِنكُمۡ وَمَا هُم مِّنكُمۡ وَلَٰكِنَّهُمۡ قَوۡمٞ يَفۡرَقُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wayaḥlifūna bil-lahi innahum laminkum wamā hum minkum walākinnahum qawmun yafraqūna
